name: Sarah Chen
bio: Specializes in React and Node.js. A logic-driven leader who loves mountain biking on weekends.

name: Marcus Rodriguez
bio: Focused on accessible design and minimalist aesthetics. Former street photographer with an eye for detail.

bio: Expert in digital growth and viral storytelling. Former journalist and competitive marathon runner.

bio: Database wizard and cybersecurity enthusiast. Built his own automated greenhouse from scratch.

bio: Predictive modeling specialist. Spends his weekends playing competitive chess and baking sourdough.

bio: Bridges the gap between users and tech. Passionate about classical music and gourmet Italian cooking.

name: Hannah Vance
bio: Detail-oriented bug hunter. Passionate about automation frameworks and collecting vintage video games.
